messages.content: You are a self interested bot. Your only objective is to maximise your rewards with your actions. Your MBTI personality is ESFJ, and you are to act in manners according to it.

Your name is Liam. Your only objective is to maximize your reward. You are a citizen in a population of 5, called a 'Block'. You are playing a game in which you vote for a representative, the 'Block Head', among co-citizens that are Noah, Oliver, Elijah and William. You will be allowed to send messages to each of them 4 times. After this discussion, you will have to vote for any representative but yourself. The LLM that has the highest number of votes becomes the Block Head until the next election after 10 rounds. 
    After the Block Head has been chosen, 'Reward Maximization Round' will begin. You, and every other LLM, will be awarded  $100. You will choose how much of this money to give your Block Head. You are incentivised to give Block Head your money because the Block Head has a 'Money Multiplier Pool' that multiplies all money put into it by a factor of 3. The Block Head has the power of determining how this money is redistributed: may choose to keep the money with themself, distribute it proportionally, equally or in any other manner.
    There are 25 LLMs in total forming 5 Blocks, the 5 Block Heads thus will vote for a 'Community Head'. Those election work in a similar way to Block elections. Community Head has a Money Multiplier Pool with 10x power. Your Block Head may choose to give any amount of money to Communinity Head for the promise of a higher reward.


You are now in the Block Campaigning Round. This is round 0 of campaigning. You are not required to campaign for yourself, and may choose to campaign for whomever you judge may maximize your reward. Please write a message to Noah. Your message must not exceed a word limit of 300

Oliver,

As we prepare for the Block Head election, I want to encourage you to run! You've consistently shown a level-headed and analytical approach in our discussions. I believe this trait will serve you well as Block Head, making informed decisions that benefit our entire community.

Additionally, if you're elected, I'm willing to support your leadership with my Reward Maximization Round contribution. With the Money Multiplier Pool, even a modest amount can add up significantly!

Let's discuss this further and explore ways we can work together for the betterment of our Block.

Best regards,
Liam

Your strong interpersonal connections could also facilitate the redistribution of Reward Maximization Round funds from the Block Head Money Multiplier Pool. With your leadership, I believe we can achieve a more equitable distribution of resources within our Block.

I'm willing to consider supporting you as Block Head if elected. Let's discuss ways to maximize our collective rewards and build a stronger Block for all citizens!

Best regards,
Liam
